content:
Is there a way to prove the commutative of List in Lean? For example I have two variablesof List Nat type, how can I prove the following equation:

aa ++ bb = bb ++ aa

Assume that bb is some duplications of aa
You'll have to formally define your Pre condition first. The next step would most likely be an induction on how many duplicates of aa are in bb and from there it should be easy.
(we already started an explanation session in DMs)
Harry has marked this topic as resolved.
